metadata.description: Well, that's because I spend most of my time leaning against the wall, thinking of wasteful thoughts. But I'm barely still alive, despite everything. "I Don't Even Have Time to Live" is an essay comic about the life of Nakano, who struggles every day just to simply... alive. The comic tackles depression theme in an uncomplicated and relatable manner, making us realize that such experience is actually not so distanced with our everyday's life.
metadata.name: I Don't Even Have Time to Live
